articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
articles.title: Warner Bros. Discovery says it's sorry for Max “oversight” listing writers and directors as “creators” - The Verge
articles.description: Warner Bros. Discovery says that “an oversight in the technical transition from HBO Max to Max” led to writers and directors being uniformly credited as “creators.”
articles.content:
Warner Bros. Discovery apologizes for crediting writers and directors as creators on Max
Warner Bros. Discovery apologizes for crediting writers and directors as creators on Max

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Solar storm threat for Earth continues amid NOAA satellites detecting sunspot decay - HT Tech
articles.description: NOAA satellites have spotted a decay in the magnetic field of sunspot AR3311. As a result, it has reduced the chances of an X-class solar flare eruption from 30% to 20%. However, it may be too early to write off the solar storm threat.
articles.content: Yesterday, it was reported that a highly unstable sunspot, AR3311, which was responsible for an X-class solar flare eruption last week, has now entered the full view of Earth. The National Oceanic an… [+2005 chars]
